content.en: DOA Estimation Algorithms: Researchers are exploring various algorithms to improve the accuracy and efficiency of Direction of Arrival (DOA) estimation, a technique used in signal processing. These algorithms, such as FOCUSS, norm approximation, weighted-L1-SRACV, and compressed MUSIC, aim to estimate the direction of incoming signals in low signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) scenarios or with limited snapshots. By utilizing techniques like sparse signal reconstruction, alternating low-rank decomposition, and Khatri-Rao product, these algorithms offer promising advancements in DOA estimation.
content.da: DOA-estimeringsalgoritmer: Forskere undersøger forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre nøjagtigheden og effektiviteten af retning af ankomst (DOA) estimering, en teknik brugt i signalbehandling. Disse algoritmer, såsom FOCUSS, norm-approksimering, vægtet-L1-SRACV og komprimeret MUSIC, sigter mod at estimere retningen for indkommende signaler i scenarier med lav signal-til-støjforhold (SNR) eller med begrænsede snapshots. Ved at anvende teknikker som sparsom signalrekonstruktion, skiftende lav-rangs dekomponering og Khatri-Rao produkt, tilbyder disse algoritmer lovende fremskridt indenfor DOA estimering.
